app

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Window
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutWindow, ClosingWindow, ForceQuitWindow, MainWindow, SavingWindow, SettingsWindow, WelcomeWindow

    public abstract class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for all windows in the application.

    It provides a common interface for initializing windows and showing/hiding them.
